name: coexistence
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of living or existing together at the same time or in the same place: The two communities enjoyed a period of peaceful coexistence. the friendly coexistence of the two nations See
co-exist
More examplesFewer examplesTheir marriage settled into a too-comfortable state of coexistence. I am focusing on the coexistence of different ethnic cultures in a multicultural community.The museum makes no apologies for the coexistence of modern technology and history.
